pullrequest.title: Add countdown feature to common::Timer, expose countdown to TimerGUIPlugin

content.html:
Oh I see, I didn't try the code. But it's good to know this about negative times, in case we want to jump back in time during log playback.

How about something like this?

  // If out of time
  if (elapsedTime > this->maxTime)
    elapsedTime = Time(0);
  else
    elapsedTime = this->maxTime - elapsedTime;
